body:
You are trying to build a native Go mobile app as a binding. Please use `gomobile build` as it is explained  at https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Mobile#building-and-deploying-to-android.

Also note that we use the issue tracker is to file bugs, please use [golang-nuts](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/golang-nuts) mailing list or [the Go forum](forum.golangbridge.org) to ask user questions.
